org.apache.beam.runners.core

Class SystemReduceFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT,W extends BoundedWindow>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.core.ReduceFn<K,InputT,OutputT,W>
      • org.apache.beam.runners.core.SystemReduceFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT,W>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - The type of key being processed.
    InputT - The type of values associated with the key.
    OutputT - The output type that will be produced for each key.
    W - The type of windows this operates on.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class SystemReduceFn<K,InputT,AccumT,OutputT,W extends BoundedWindow>
extends ReduceFn<K,InputT,OutputT,W>
    ReduceFn implementing the default reduction behaviors of GroupByKey.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • onTrigger

        public void onTrigger(ReduceFn.OnTriggerContext c)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from class: ReduceFn
        Called when triggers fire.

        Implementations of ReduceFn should call ReduceFn.OnTriggerContext.output(OutputT) to emit any results that should be included in the pane produced by this trigger firing.

        Specified by:
        onTrigger in class ReduceFn<K,InputT,OutputT,W extends BoundedWindow>

      • clearState

        public void clearState(ReduceFn.Context c)
                throws Exception
        Description copied from class: ReduceFn
        Called to clear any persisted state that the ReduceFn may be holding. This will be called when the windowing is closing and will receive no future interactions.
